The image was cropped to make the spider: but a frozen spider can still be seen at the bottom of the image, indicating the web's actual large size.
The photograph of the: frozen spider web" was actually an ice sculpture created in 2011 for the Art Meets Ice competition at the Helsinki Zoo. It was not a real frozen spider web.
The sculpture was created by a Kenyan jo: Michael Kaloki, and Timo Koivisto of Finland, for the competition.
Kaloki and Koivisto won first prize in t: s competition that year with their sculpture of a spider and its web.
